name: Winvest Technology Consultancy Services Pvt Ltd
description:
Winvest Technology Consultancy Services Private Limited (WINVEST) is an IT Solution and Services company, focusing on industry specific niche solutions that help organizations in their journey of digital transformation.
WINVEST works with individuals and organizations globally, who are interested in innovative solutions promising value-creation for enterprises. WINVEST supports new ideas to take shape in terms of ideation, development, execution and go-to-market.
With its proven methodology, tools and flexible approach, WINVEST assists enterprises to measure and manage the value-adds, thus enriching and fostering the process of value-creations.
The Leadership team at WINVEST brings in over 30 years of work experience with global leaders in IT industry. The enriched work experience in multiple technology landscape, multiple geographies and multiple verticals enable WINVEST in its advisory role to its global customers.
The core tenet of WINVEST lies in Customer Centricity, Integrity, Collaboration, Partnership and Innovation.
